channel.title: XP Counter Issues
channel.description: [center] Used this tut for xp counter [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/287428-how-add-xp-counter.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/287428-how-add-xp-counter.html[/url] When I try to log in it gives me errors and spams the chatbox saying " From Invalid Name: " Could someone help me on skype or something on adding XP Counter Skype - TrillDoesGFX Client atm - [img]http://i.imgur.com/1NfEmXg.png[/img] [spoiler=Errors] [code] ******** - Ferocity Map Amount: 1226 508 Object Amount: 38424 NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 Error: T1 - 145,0 - 134,134 Error: T1 - 26,0 - 145,134 Error: T1 - 59,0 - 174,26 Error: T1 - 170,0 - 59,174 [/code] or [code] ******** - Ferocity Map Amount: 1226 508 Object Amount: 38424 NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBound***ception: 220 at client.drawRedStones(client.java:2194) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2244) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8568) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9521) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5166) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) [/code][/spoiler] [/center]

item.title: XP Counter Issues
item.dc:creator: @SoDMG SoDMG
item.description:
@SoDMG wrote:

[center] Used this tut for xp counter http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/287428-how-add-xp-counter.html
When I try to log in it gives me errors and spams the chatbox saying " From Invalid Name: "
Could someone help me on skype or something on adding XP Counter
